headline: The Collapse of a Car-Parts Supplier Puts Spotlight on How Cash Flow Can Lie
summary: The old maxim “Buy low, sell high” has a cash-flow corollary: “Collect early, pay late.”  Last fall’s collapse of auto-parts supplier First Brands has brought renewed scrutiny to some long-used financial-engineering techniques, especially in the field known as supply-chain finance.
